Reuters updated 1/21/2011 7:49:28 AM ET 2011-01-21T12:49:28 Share Print Font:+- LONDON- The British prime minister's communications chief Andy Coulson resigned on Friday as prosecutors stepped up their inquiries into illegal phone hacking at a tabloid newspaper when he was editor. "We confirm that Andy Coulson has resigned, an official in Prime Minister David Cameron 's office said. Andy Coulson was a key part of David Cameron 's inner circle after joining the Conservative leader's team when in opposition in 2007. David Cameron had said Monday that

After Allen Iverson drove and missed from close, Marcus Camby tipped the ball and Linas Kleiza got possession, hitting the shot from the left wing while falling away under pressure. I just looked up at the clock and saw it was two seconds left, shot it up and it went in, Linas Kleiza said. Carmelo Anthony had 30 points and 12 rebounds, Marcus Camby added 19 points, 14 boards and three blocked shots, and Allen Iverson had his streak of four straight 30-point performances end, finishing with 21. "In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana," Mike Pence and wife Karen said in the letter. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012. Mike Pence 's supporters, who include Tea Party advocates, have been pressing him to mount a bid for the Republican nomination.
